title: CHICKEN CURRY
directions: Add the wet paste ingredients to mixer bowl, blend for 1 min/speed 9/MC on. Scrape bowl down.
Add the olive oil, curry leaves, star anise, cloves and cinnamon stick, as well as 50 g or 1.8 oz of the coconut cream. Cook for 20 min/100째C or 212째F/reverse/speed soft/MC on.
Insert butterfly attachment, add chicken, remainder of coconut cream, water, salt and sugar. Cook for 17 min/100째C or 212째F/reverse/speed soft/MC off.
Remove whole spices and majority of the curry leaves and serve.
ingredients: 3-7 small red dried chillis (adjust based on spice preference)
240 g | 8.5 oz brown onion, peeled, halved
10 sprigs of curry leaves (yes 10 whole sprigs! this is a small handful of leaves if using dried)
400 ml | 13.52 fl oz coconut cream (Ayum brand)
